data.title: Local Optimization Versus Global Optimization
data.description: Optimization refers to finding the set of inputs to an objective function that results in the maximum or minimum output from the objective function. It is common to describe optimization problems in terms of local vs. global optimization. Similarly, it is also common to describe optimization algorithms or search algorithms in terms of local vs. […]
